com.google.android.drdat.gui.DrdatListTasks

DrdatListTasks Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Activity class that uses a WebView component which lets us select a task we want to do.

The DrdatCL content provider DrdatTasklist provides us with the html.

Author:
cal
